title: Maximize utility with more pencils, less pads

content.description: An art student spends all of her income on pencils and drawing pads. The student currently buys 30 pencils at $1 each and 10 pads at $5 each.
content.question: If the marginal utility of the 30th pencil is 100 utils and the marginal utility of the 10th pad is 400 utils, to maximize utility the student should change her purchases of pencils and pads in which of the following ways?

choices.label:
Pencils
 Pads

Not change
 Buy more

Pencils
 Pads

Buy more
 Buy more

Pencils
 Pads

 Buy less

Pencils
 Pads

Buy less
 Buy more

Pencils
 Pads

 Buy less

content.answer:
Pencils
 Pads

Buy more
 Buy less
